author: _prototypo
content:
Hi all, PegaSys Team X has been working on a proposal to allow Stateless nodes to get the information they need to answer more JSON RPC API calls. We think the key to that is to allow them to efficiently cache the most active account and contract state.

We've put a document containing our proposal here:

Enabling Efficient Caching of Accounts and Contracts in Eth1.x and Eth2 using Referrers https://hackmd.io/-_II-qyQR6OOeS8J7gMVgQ?view

Any reviews, comments, edits or suggestions would be wonderful. Cheers.

<@!364458974906548225> You might want to have a look prior to our call tomorrow.

Special thanks to <@!689635476826619924> <@!688889240125308981> <@!636680106630316033> and others not on Discord for their contribution to this proposal!
